title: First Round Recommendation Letters (Marybeth Stalp)
dc:creator: Queens Podcast Lab
description:
Should departments be asking for first-round letters when hiring professors?

Our guest today is Marybeth Stalp from the University of Northern Iowa. We are also joined by special guest host Sarah Patterson from the University of Michigan.

Photo Credits

By Jon BodsworthOriginal uploader was Zerida at en.wikipedia - Original source found here: http://www.egyptarchive.co.uk/html/hidden_treasures/hidden_treasures_06.html, and copyright info is found here: http://www.egyptarchive.co.uk/html/contact.html, Copyrighted free use, Link
